posts.post_content:
Looking to buy or trade for T222 Baumgardner and L. Magee.  Will look at literally any condition.  Have other T222s including some shortprints available.  Please let me know if you have either or both available.  Would also be looking for a Huggins, but to a much less extent.  

Thanks
DJ
Bump, still looking for a L. Magee.  Anyone have one available?
